scripts.dev: npm run build && export $(cat .env | xargs)&& functions-framework --target=voicemail_handler --port=8080
scripts.zip: zip -r functions.zip src/ package.json package-lock.json tsconfig.json tsconfig.prod.json
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run zip && cd infrastructure && npm ci && ENVIRONMENT=dev cdktf deploy --auto-approve=true && cd .. && rm functions.zip && rm -rf dist/
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run zip && cd infrastructure && npm ci && ENVIRONMENT=prod cdktf deploy --auto-approve=true && cd .. && rm functions.zip && rm -rf dist/
scripts.deploy:plan: cd infrastructure && npm ci && cdktf diff --no-color && cd ..
